name: PCB Coil Generator
description: Generates multilayer PCB coils for direct placement or as a footprint
description_full:
The PCB Coil Creator is an addon that allows you to generate multilayer PCB coils directly within KiCad. It features a UI for configuring parameters like layer count, trace width, and coil dimensions.

The generated coils can be used as footprints or embedded directly into board designs, making it a versatile tool for various PCB projects.

author.name: Tim Goll & Jonas Wenner, DIaLOGIKa GmbH

maintainer.name: Tim Goll & Jonas Wenner, DIaLOGIKa GmbH
